titles.title: A bill to direct the Assistant Secretary of Commerce for Communications and Information to make grants for the establishment or expansion of internet exchange facilities, and for other purposes.
Internet Exchange Act of 2019
Internet Exchange Act of 2019
Internet Exchange Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary:
Internet Exchange Act of 2019
This bill creates a grant program for the establishment and expansion of facilities through which internet service providers and content delivery networks exchange internet traffic (internet exchange facilities) in unserved or underserved areas.
Further, the bill allows recipients of funding from the E-Rate and Telehealth programs to apply such funds to the procurement or maintenance of a connection to an internet exchange facility.
